segments.text: I would like to have this laundry done .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please fill out the form first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . By the way , I would like to have this sweater washed by hand in cold water . It might shrink otherwise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By hand in cold water . Got it .
segments.speaker: S2
